attributes.action: investigate alternatives to war by setting up a commission which will thoroughly investigate how our values and democracy can be protected by non-violent means
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it is clear that war rarely achieves a satisfactory result,we ask that the government also sets up an ongoing investigation in various universities to promote alternatives to violence and war.  The research should cover personal as well as international conflict, and should investigate the non-violent theory and actions instigated by M. Gandhi and Martin Luther King and how they can be applied in the 21st. century.
